title: How to unsubscribe from Opendatabot
description: Opendatabot is a Ukrainian service that provides company information and monitoring. Since there is no information about canceling Opendatabot subscriptions, here are general steps to manage subscriptions. Contacting them directly would be the best way to get the most up-to-date cancellation information.

steps_1.title: Cancel Subscription via Opendatabot Website
steps_1.description:
To cancel your Opendatabot subscription via their website:

*   Go to the Opendatabot official website: opendatabot.ua.
*   Look for a 'Billing' or 'Subscription' section within your account.
*   Find the option to cancel your current subscription.
*   Follow the on-screen instructions to confirm the cancellation.

steps_2.title: Cancel Subscription via Customer Support
steps_2.description:
To cancel your Opendatabot subscription via customer support:

*   Contact Opendatabot's customer support at sales@opendatabot.com or call +380 67 778 0908 for specific cancellation instructions.

steps_3.title: Manage Subscription in Account Settings
steps_3.description:
To manage your subscription through account settings:

*   Check your account settings for subscription management options.

seo_text: Learn how to cancel your Opendatabot subscription. Follow these simple steps to manage and cancel your Opendatabot subscription. Contact Opendatabot support for assistance.
